flavorText: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.

foreignData.flavorText: Nur ein Ort war groß genug, um als Gefängnis für Emrakul zu dienen.
foreignData.name: Gefangen im Mond
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, ein Land oder einen Planeswalker
Die verzauberte bleibende Karte ist ein farbloses Land mit „{T}: Erzeuge {C}" und verliert alle anderen Kartentypen und Fähigkeiten.

foreignData.flavorText: Solo una prisión era lo suficientemente grande para Emrakul.
foreignData.name: Prisión lunar
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura, tierra o planeswalker.
El permanente encantado es una tierra incolora con "{T}: Agrega {C}" y pierde todos sus otros tipos de carta y habilidades.

foreignData.flavorText: Il n'y avait qu'un seul endroit assez grand pour contenir Emrakul.
foreignData.name: Prisonnier de la lune
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature, terrain ou planeswalker
Le permanent enchanté est un terrain incolore avec « {T} : Ajoutez {C} » et perd tous ses autres types de carte et capacités.

foreignData.flavorText: C'era solo un posto abbastanza grande da contenere Emrakul.
foreignData.name: Imprigionare nella Luna
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura, terra o planeswalker
Il permanente incantato è una terra incolore con "{T}: Aggiungi {C}" e perde tutti gli altri tipi di carta e le altre abilità.

foreignData.flavorText: エムラクールを閉じ込められるほど大きなものは一つしかなかった。
foreignData.name: 月への封印
foreignData.text:

foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: Somente uma câmara era grande o suficiente para conter Emrakul.

foreignData.text:

A permanente encantada é um terreno incolor com "{T}: Adicione {C}" e perde todos os outros tipos de card e habilidades.

foreignData.flavorText: Лишь одна темница была способна вместить Эмракул.

Зачаровать существо, землю или planeswalker'а
Зачарованный перманент является бесцветной землей со способностью «{T}: добавьте {C}» и теряет все другие типы карты и способности.

foreignData.flavorText: 只有一个天牢大到足以囚困伊莫库。

所結附的永久物是無色地，且具有「{T}：加{C}」，並失去所有其他牌張類別和異能。

name: Imprisoned in the Moon
originalText:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

rulings.text: At the time the permanent becomes enchanted, Imprisoned in the Moon causes it to lose all abilities except the noted mana ability. Any abilities the permanent gains after that point will work normally.
The permanent will keep any supertypes it previously had. Notably, if Imprisoned in the Moon is enchanting a legendary permanent, that permanent will continue to be legendary.

If the enchanted permanent is a land and has land types, it retains those types even though it loses any intrinsic mana abilities associated with them. For example, a Plains enchanted by Imprisoned in the Moon is still a Plains, but it can't tap for {W}, only for {C}.
If you remove Imprisoned in the Moon from a planeswalker after tapping it for mana, you can still activate a loyalty ability of that planeswalker even though it's tapped.

Becoming a land may cause other Auras to become illegally attached. These are put into their owner's graveyard, and any Equipment attached to the land become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Counters on the land remain on it even if they don't do anything.

text:
